main: ^Is that really you?! I was able to release my spirit from my body before I lost the battle. And I'll help you get the flower.
^This flower can wake me up, but I think you already talked to the wizard about it.
^The villain Torgath has taken advantage of the instability in the kingdom and broken the seal that holds back the darkness.
^He wants to take possession of the flower, but we have protected the forest with an additional barrier against the darkness beforehand, so we have some time.
^This flower <color=#F8FF30>niluria</color> can resist the darkness. I don't know why the flower has such power.

^According to legend, the last seed of the <color=#F8FF30>Telurin</color> tree was defiled and could not bloom. The sun illuminated it with its light, and a flower sprang up from the seed. The flower was named <color=#F8FF30>niluria</color>, which means “illuminated by light.” It has been able to resist evil ever since.

finishGame: ^Let's plant a flower beside me; you <color=#F8FF30>have met all the tests</color>. Save me. Together we can resist the darkness.
